video_title: Just be there for them ❤️ From my episode with @NessaBarrett
transcript:
I think when we love someone we think we
have to solve their problems and we
think we have to say the perfect thing
and we think we can fix it actually what
we need to do is be patient and
supportive and loving and kind and just
be there yeah and we don't have to say
the perfect thing we don't have to have
the perfect advice because we don't know
what it feels
